translations.translation: They will say: "To God." Say: "Then why do you not bethink yourselves?"
They will surely say: "Allah's." Say: "Then why do you not take heed?"
They will quickly reply, "It belongs to God." Say, "Will you not, then, take heed?"
Thereupon they will say, “To Allah”; proclaim, “Therefore why do you not ponder?”
They will say: "It is Allah's!" Say: "Will you not then remember"
They will say: Allah's. Say: Will you not then mind?
They will say, God's.' Say: 'Will you not then remember?'
They will say: Unto Allah. Say: Will ye not then remember?
They will say, "To God." Say, "So will you not pay heed?
They will surely say: God's. Say thou: will ye not then heed?
They will say, ‘To Allah.’ Say, ‘Will you not then take admonition?’
They will say, "To Allah!" say: "Yet will ye not receive admonition?"
They will say: "It is Allah's!" Say: "Will you not then remember?"
They will say: 'To Allah' Say: 'Then will you not remember'
They will say, “To God.” Say, “Will you not reflect?”
They will say, "To Allah." Say, "Then will you not remember?"

[23:85] They will say, ‘To God’. Say, to them: ‘Will you not then remember?’ (tadhakkarūna, the second tā’ [of tatadhakkarūna] has been assimilated with the dhāl) will you [not then] be admonished and so realise that the One Who has the power to originate creation also has the power to resurrect after death?
(They will say: Unto Allah. Say) to them, Muhammad: (Will ye not then remember) will you not then take heed and obey Allah?

commentaries.author: الجيلاني
commentaries.text: { سَيَقُولُونَ } في الجواب ألبتة: { لِلَّهِ } إذ لا يمكنهم الإنكار بالصريح المحقق المثبت { قُلْ } لهم بعدما اعترفوا بأن الأرض، ومن عليها لله سبحانه موبخاً عليهم ومقرعاً: { أَ } تنكرون أيها الجاهلون قدرة الله على إعادة المعدوم وحشر الأجساد { فَلاَ تَذَكَّرُونَ } [المؤمنون: 85] وتستحضرون قدرة الحق على إبداء هذه البدائع والعجائب المستحدثة على الأرض بلا سبق مادةٍ ومدة، ومع ذلك تنكرون، ومن إعادة من عليها، سيما بعد سبق مادتها، مع أن هذا أهون من ذلك
